front.title: Fast Router Discovery with RA Caching in AP

abstract.t: This document presents RA Caching in AP for Fast Router Discovery.For seamless handoff, a mobile node MUST quickly discover its newaccess router. In our proposal AP caches Router Advertisementmessage and sends it to a new mobile node as soon as L2 associationis made. We present a way for AP to cache necessary RA. By putting'RA Caching' and 'AP Notification' functionality on AP, we get theoptimized result without IPv6 standard change.
